ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 839
ygData.msgSnippet: At 51 I would think you could handle Dulak fairly well.  I could solo there with my druid pulling singles or quad kiting at 49.  It s decent xp. As far as AA
ygData.messageBody:
At 51 I would think you could handle Dulak fairly well.  I could solo there with my druid pulling singles or quad kiting at 49.  It's decent xp. As far as AA points go, in your AA window there's a slider bar where you can set the percentage of XP earned to go for levels or AA.  Most people I know will set it at 50% so half the XP goes toward leveling and the other half to AA.  This takes awhile to get AA though.  One guy I know waited til he hit level 65 and THEN started working on his AA points.  As far as what to spend them on, I'd suggest the General skills first since you'll most likely get more immediate use from them. 
 
Wulfric
 
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Rebecca Garner
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, September 12, 2003 11:39 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 839

Hiya ya'll, I actually ahve a couple quick questions, i tend to stay quiet,
read the emails, and learn from that but now i'm at a cross roads and some
advice would be great. I just dinged 51, i'm a De Wizzy (with faction issues
in Nek and i have no idea what i did to get that way) now i am curious about
2 things, levels vs AA and where can i go to get good xp w/ low risk to my
life, and, (ok so maybe 3 questions) where /how should i spend my AA points
(as i get them)
that about does it,
i play on Thouxle Paelles, usually from 11pm est-2am or so, and most
weekends if anyone wants to look me up
Adaliana Darkmysries
51 Wizard
